name: Don't Get Crushed
description:
A Ludum Dare 42 submission.

 I've removed the web version because it had a lot of issues that made it a way worse experience then the desktop build 😭😭😭.

(The web version has performance issues and the online highscores only work in the desktop build. For a better experience play the desktop version please. 😭😭😭 :()

Controls:

  • W /Space - Jump
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • LMB - Shoot
